DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_TITLE: Biobank Japan WGS data of myocardial infarction and dementia
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT: The Biobank Japan (BBJ) Project started and has collected around 200,000 individuals with disease cases consisting of 51 diseases. The purpose of the BBJ is to realize personalized medicine. With the use of about 2200 samples in the BBJ, whole-genome sequnecing was conducted at RIKEN, Center for Integrative Medical Sciences.
